mapper.select: SELECT distinct T.week, T.bookFileUrl, IF(IFNULL(f.id, 0) = 0, 0, 1) as weeklyParticipate FROM (SELECT distinct b.id AS bid, CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(start_date, '%d') = '01' THEN 1 WHEN DATE_FORMAT(start_date, '%d') = '08' THEN 2 WHEN DATE_FORMAT(start_date, '%d') = '15' THEN 3 WHEN DATE_FORMAT(start_date, '%d') = '22' THEN 4 END AS WEEK, b.file_url AS bookFileUrl, TRUE AS weeklyParticipate, w.start_date, w.end_date FROM book b inner JOIN weekly_event w ON DATE(w.start_date) between DATE(CONCAT(#{year}, '-', #{month}, '-01')) and DATE(LAST_DAY(CONCAT(#{year}, '-', #{month}, '-01'))) AND b.id = w.book_id) AS T LEFT outer join feed f ON DATE(f.create_at) between DATE(T.start_date) AND DATE(T.end_date) and f.user_id = #{userId} AND T.bid = f.book_id

SELECT distinct b.id bid, b.file_url, w.id wid FROM weekly_event w, book b WHERE DATE(CONCAT(#{year}, '-', #{month}, '-', #{day})) BETWEEN DATE(start_date) AND DATE(end_date) - 1 AND b.id = w.book_id LIMIT 1

SELECT distinct T1.fid, T1.create_at, T1.content, T1.f_file_url, IF(IFNULL(t.feed_id, 0) != 0, 1, 0) AS is_thumb, T1.thumb_cnt, T1.uid, T1.nickname, T1.u_file_url, T1.bid, T1.book_name FROM (SELECT u.id AS uid, f.id fid, create_at, content, f.file_url AS f_file_url, nickname, u.file_url AS u_file_url, b.id AS bid, b.book_name, COUNT(distinct t.user_id) AS thumb_cnt FROM feed f INNER JOIN user u INNER JOIN book b INNER JOIN weekly_event w on f.user_id = u.id AND f.book_id = b.id AND b.id = w.book_id AND w.id = #{weeklyId} AND Date(f.create_at) BETWEEN DATE(w.start_date) AND DATE(w.end_date) AND f.blocked = 0 left outer join thumb t on t.feed_id = f.id GROUP BY f.id) AS T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN thumb t ON T1.fid = t.feed_id AND #{userId} = t.user_id ORDER BY T1.create_at DESC

SELECT COUNT(distinct user_id) FROM weekly_event w, book b, feed f WHERE w.id = #{weeklyId} AND w.book_id = b.id AND b.id = f.book_id AND DATE(f.create_at) BETWEEN DATE(start_date) AND DATE(end_date) - 1

SELECT T.id, T.nickname, T.file_url, IF(IFNULL(following, 0) = 0, 0, 1) AS isFollow FROM (SELECT distinct u.id, u.nickname, u.file_url, f.create_at FROM weekly_event w, book b, feed f, user u WHERE w.id = #{weeklyId} AND w.book_id = b.id AND b.id = f.book_id AND f.user_id = u.id AND DATE(f.create_at) BETWEEN DATE(start_date) AND DATE(end_date) - 1 AND u.id != #{userId}) AS T LEFT OUTER JOIN follow fo ON T.id = fo.following AND fo.follower = #{userId} ORDER BY isFollow DESC
SELECT distinct d.id AS did, k.id AS kid, k.keyword FROM daily_event d, keyword k WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_at, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{param} AND d.keyword_id = k.id

SELECT distinct T1.fid, T1.create_at, T1.content, T1.f_file_url, IF(IFNULL(t.feed_id, 0) != 0, 1, 0) AS is_thumb, T1.thumb_cnt, T1.uid, T1.nickname, T1.u_file_url, T1.bid, T1.book_name FROM (SELECT u.id AS uid, f.id fid, f.create_at, content, f.file_url AS f_file_url, nickname, u.file_url AS u_file_url, b.id AS bid, b.book_name, COUNT(distinct t.user_id) AS thumb_cnt FROM feed f INNER JOIN user u INNER JOIN book b INNER JOIN book_keyword bk INNER JOIN daily_event d on f.user_id = u.id AND f.book_id = b.id AND b.id = bk.book_id AND d.keyword_id = bk.keyword_id AND d.id = #{dailyId} AND DATE(d.create_at) = DATE(f.create_at) AND f.blocked = 0 left outer join thumb t on t.feed_id = f.id GROUP BY f.id) AS T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN thumb t ON T1.fid = t.feed_id AND #{userId} = t.user_id ORDER BY T1.create_at DESC

SELECT T.id, T.nickname, T.file_url, IF(IFNULL(f.following, 0) = 0, 0, 1) AS isFollow FROM (SELECT distinct u.id, u.nickname, u.file_url, dep.create_at FROM daily_event_participate dep, user u, daily_event d WHERE dep.daily_id = #{dailyId} AND u.id = dep.user_id AND d.id = dep.daily_id AND DATE(dep.create_at) = DATE(d.create_at)) AS T LEFT OUTER JOIN follow f ON T.id = f.following AND f.follower = #{userId} ORDER BY T.create_at DESC
